an5.59:1.1: â€œPancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato dullabho vuddhapabbajito.
an5.59:1.3: Dullabho, bhikkhave, vuddhapabbajito nipuno, dullabho akappasampanno, dullabho bahussuto, dullabho dhammakathiko, dullabho vinayadharo.
an5.59:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato dullabho vuddhapabbajitoti.
